elements.name: 01 No goal set in the Goal Type/Value box

steps.name: I search/filter for a flight with No goal
Click on Apply button
There is an Add icon in the box orange to inform the user action is required
The box states 'Goal Info and Target'
I am a Proteus User
I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns

elements.name: 02 Add/Edit goal set in the Goal Type/Value box

steps.name: I search/filter for a flight with No goal
Click on Apply button
There is an Add icon in the box orange to inform the user action is required
Click on Add 'Goal Info and Target'
Option to select Goal Type and Goal Value exist

comments.value: #Goal Value (depending on goal type, value could be percentage/numeric/cost)

steps.name: Select Goal Type, Goal Value and Save
Selected Goal Type and Goal Values saved
There is an edit icon in the box
Click to edit Goal Type
Option to select Goal Type and Goal Value exist

comments.value: #Goal Value (depending on goal type, value could be percentage/numeric/cost)

steps.name: Edit Goal Type, Goal Value and Save
Edited Goal Type and Goal Values saved

name: Ability to edit flight Goal data in Campaigns
